summary: Contoso Wireless offers 32" HD LED TVs, 50" 4K Smart TVs, and 70" 4K Ultra HD Smart TVs. Customers can take advantage of free shipping on orders over $200 and a 10% discount when purchasing two or more TVs. All TVs come with a one-year limited warranty and customers have the option to return their purchase within 30 days of purchase. Contoso Wireless also offers extended warranties and financing options, as well as an online help center for customers.
